text: Frank Arrigo (1917–1977) was an American art director.Pitts p.159 He worked on more than a hundred and fifty films and television series during his career. From 1959 to 1971 he also directed episodes of several television series. ==Selected filmography== * Will Tomorrow Ever Come?
